## Definition of Done

### Design

- [ ] **RFC**: Describe the design of the Epic implementation, add Dev/Docs/QE/RelEng representatives on the PR

### Development

- [ ] Code is **reviewed** and approved by at least one other developer
- [ ] **Unit tests** are written and passing
- [ ] **Basic Cucumber tests** written by developers as part of the code changes PR (add QE in the PR)
- [ ] Code is **merged** into the main or a released branch
- [ ] (OPTIONAL) **Performance metrics** are within acceptable limits

### Testing

- [ ] **Manual testing**: Exploratory tests were conducted and completed
- [ ] **Regression tests** are all passing (aka CI/BV test suites)
- [ ] (OPTIONAL) **Additional E2E tests** are created and passing
- [ ] (OPTIONAL) **Security vulnerabilities** have been checked and remediated
- [ ] (OPTIONAL) **Major bugs** found during testing are fixed and verified

### Documentation

- [ ] **Technical specifications** are updated
- [ ] **API documentation** is current and accurate
- [ ] **User documentation** or knowledge base articles are written
- [ ] **Product requirements** or feature descriptions are updated
